name: Energy Crisis (Andrew Leclair, Akalbiam, PirateRiot, Zalandrys)
name_original: Energy Crisis (Andrew Leclair, Akalbiam, PirateRiot, Zalandrys)
description:
In Energy Crisis, you have to supply power back to the Reactor before a catastrophic meltdown. Connect various buildings to manage your energy supply through special effects and combo streaks.

Energy Crisis was made in 7 days for the Lost Relic Game Jam with the theme of "Connection".

Access settings at any point during the game by clicking on the clipboard icon or by pressing the escape key.

Made By:

  • Andrew Leclair - Game Design, Art, Programming
  • Daniel Leclair - Game Design, Programming
  • Brian Kalb - Game Design, Music, Sound Design
  • Kenny Ballard - QA
